description:
Revision 842 failed to build packages on Launchpad. Discovered this with our custom nova packages, but also saw failure for the official version here: https://launchpad.net/~nova-core/+archive/trunk/+buildjob/2335416

Tests are failing:

WsgiLimiterProxyTest
    test_403                                                    ERROR
WsgiLimiterTest
    test_response_to_delays                                     ERROR
 ServersTest
    test_get_servers_with_limit                                 FAIL
    test_get_servers_with_offset                                FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_no_contents           FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_no_path               FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_not_a_list            FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_with_non_b64_content  FAIL
LockoutTestCase
    test_lockout                                                ERROR
    test_multiple_keys                                          ERROR
    test_timeout                                                ERROR

Saw similar problems when building binary packages on our local Lucid box. The solution was to upgrade the python WebOb package to 0.9.8 using pip, as mentioned in the pip-requires. (It appears that the required version bumped up recently)

The python-webob package in the lucid universe repository is at 0.9.7.1, which is probably why it's breaking.
title: lucid nova packages fail to build on Launchpad

comments.content:
Revision 842 failed to build packages on Launchpad. Discovered this with our custom nova packages, but also saw failure for the official version here: https://launchpad.net/~nova-core/+archive/trunk/+buildjob/2335416

Tests are failing:

WsgiLimiterProxyTest
    test_403                                                    ERROR
WsgiLimiterTest
    test_response_to_delays                                     ERROR
 ServersTest
    test_get_servers_with_limit                                 FAIL
    test_get_servers_with_offset                                FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_no_contents           FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_no_path               FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_not_a_list            FAIL
    test_create_instance_with_personality_with_non_b64_content  FAIL
LockoutTestCase
    test_lockout                                                ERROR
    test_multiple_keys                                          ERROR
    test_timeout                                                ERROR

Saw similar problems when building binary packages on our local Lucid box. The solution was to upgrade the python WebOb package to 0.9.8 using pip, as mentioned in the pip-requires. (It appears that the required version bumped up recently)

The python-webob package in the lucid universe repository is at 0.9.7.1, which is probably why it's breaking.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lorinh

comments.content: Soren added a python-webob package to the trunk PPA, packages are now building again.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lorinh
